overview:
Annemarie Penny co-founded Apex Direct Search in 1996. A skilled collector and combiner of people in the southern California tech community, Annemarie offers resourcefulness, high energy, and positive attitude. Is the cup half empty or half full? Neither - it’s completely full!

Apex became a “dot com specialist” in Los Angeles when some people still thought the internet was just a fad. Needless to say, it was a wise decision, given the continued explosive growth of tech startups and digital media in Los Angeles and Orange County. Annemarie has been featured regularly as an industry expert in the Los Angeles Times, MSNBC, CNBC, and other media outlets. Apex Direct Search is a respected boutique firm known for its integrity and local search capabilities.

On the side, Annemarie executive produced several independent feature films. She continues to produce events on an intimate or epic scale for which she is famous and occasionally infamous.

Annemarie began her career as a corporate financial analyst for Hughes Aircraft Company and Big 4 accounting firm KPMG Peat Marwick. She earned her MBA in marketing from California State University, Long Beach.
